Key Match Events: Bhanuka Rajapaksa scored 31 runs off 14 balls and helped Sri Lanka beat Afghanistan by four wickets on Saturday in Dubai.
Post-Match Reflections: The wicket seemed quite good with the way they batted, we just needed to be a bit cautious when the spinners came into play.
In the IPL, I can bat at three, but to strengthen the middle order, I was put at five. It's a floating role, but I like it.
It was very embarrassing for us to get out for 105, so we wanted to put our hands up and show the nation we weren't as bad as that.
